Uses of BusinessSearchException in realtimeweb.simplebusiness.exceptions
 

Subclasses of BusinessSearchException in realtimeweb.simplebusiness.exceptions
 class AccountUnconfirmedException
          Indicates that the Yelp account has not yet been activated.
 class AreaTooLargeException
          Indicates that the geographical area is too large for this search request.
 class BusinessUnavailableException
          Indicates that there may not be able to provide details for certain businesses, for example if they don't have any reviews yet.
 class DataUnreadableException
          An exception thrown when the data received from a Yelp API call is unreadable.
 class DisconnectionException
          An exception thrown when a call to the online Yelp service fails, possibly because of a lost Internet connection.
 class ExceededReqsException
          Indicates that the number of requests executed for the given API key has exceeded its daily limit.
 class InternalErrorException
          Indicates an internal server error has occurred.
 class InvalidCredentialsException
          Indicates that the email/password for Yelp account authorization is invalid.
 class InvalidOAuthCredentialsException
          The request requires a user and the user specified is missing or invalid.
 class InvalidOAuthUserException
          Indicates that an input parameter is missing from the request.
 class InvalidParameterException
          Indicates that an input parameter value in the request is invalid.
 class InvalidSignatureException
          Indicates that the oauth_signature for the request is invalid.
 class MissingParameterException
          Indicates that an input parameter is missing from the request.
 class MultipleLocationsException
          Indicates that the given search location could not be disambiguated - that is, there were multiple possible locations, and the Yelp service which one you wanted!
 class PasswordTooLongException
          Indicates that the password for the Yelp account is too long.
 class UnavailableForLocationException
          Indicates that API requests are unavailable in the given location.
